Overview

On September 11, 2025, I had the opportunity to attend the seminar “Strengthening Cloud Operations with Smart Security and Protection” held at Sheraton Hotel, Surabaya. The program â€” scheduled from 09:00 to 17:00 â€” featured several vendors and speakers, including representatives from Mastersystem Infotama, AWS, Fortinet, Infoblox, and Veeam. I arrived at 12:30 due to an unexpected class obligation.
